scenes.imagePrompt: Traditional Indian illustration style. A dusty, busy trade route or bazaar scene. Travelers resting under a large banyan tree, looking hungry. Warm, golden lighting.

Traditional Indian illustration style. Close-up of an old, wise-looking halwai (sweet maker) in his shop, surrounded by large brass utensils and sacks of lentils (dal). He has a thoughtful, inspired expression.

Traditional Indian illustration style. A village kitchen scene. Focus on hands expertly sealing the dough balls (kachoris). Warm oil bubbling gently in a large iron kadhai (wok). Steam rising, nostalgic feel.

Traditional Indian illustration style. A stack of perfectly golden-brown, crispy kachoris being served on a traditional leaf plate (pattal) with vibrant green and red chutneys. Joyful, cinematic, nostalgic scene.
